ComicInfo.Title: When Gods Have Joined Together!
ComicInfo.Summary: When Gods Have Joined Together!: The Eternals form the Uni-Mind to try to attack the Celestials. They never get the chance as the might of the Greek Gods, lead by Zeus and accompanied by Odin, attack the home city of the Eternals, forcing them to return.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:20:53. [Issue ID 34067]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: The Young Gods,Valkin],Ares,Sersi,Reject],cameo),Fandral,The Warriors Three [Hogun,Volstagg],Sif,Margo Damian (cameo),Dr. Daniel Damian (cameo),Fafnir the Dragon,Mutates [Karkas,Ikaris,Eternals [Zuras,Thor,Odin,The One Above All],Sprite,Athena,Hercules,The Uni-Mind,The Forgotten One,Thena,Zeus,Makkari,Celestials [Arishem (flashback,Mercury
